title: Similar flavour font to suggest for "big stereo" blog logo?
content:
I think this is not a font but may be, somebody will suggest one with the same flavour (looks like a flatened band of a music tape)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824011528im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bs_6357.gif)
author: Ryuk

comments.content:
My suggestion only resembles this in feeling, not in the flattened tape detail. This is from [Harold Lohner](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824011528/http:/www.haroldsfonts.com/).

- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824011528im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SyncopatedScript_5509.gif)
That's a good suggestion. Many thanks Mike.
